SYNTAX. The Article.

The simplest use of the article when coupled with a singular noun is to single out, as eoncerned in the assertion made, one particular member of the class denoted by the noun, which member is supposed to be at once recognized by the reader either from his general knowledge, as ὁ (esde, or from information supplied in the context, as τὴν ἐσθῆτα, τῷ πτωχῷ in ii. 3, after previous mention.
